languages.text: "Вольный Торговец". {n}Хейнрикс обращается к вам сквозь стиснутые зубы.{/n} "Вы уничтожаете единственный шанс оказаться полезным для Инквизиции и меня лично. Не испытывайте судьбу и не сопротивляйтесь... следствию".

traits.locale_text: "Вольный Торговец". {n}Хейнрикс обращается к вам сквозь стиснутые зубы.{/n} "Этот, как вы называете, цирк — ваш единственный шанс оказаться полезным для Инквизиции и меня лично. Не испытывайте судьбу и не сопротивляйтесь... следствию".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Rogue Trader." {n}Heinrix addresses you through clenched teeth.{/n} "You are destroying your only chance to make yourself useful to the Inquisition and to me personally. Do not tempt fate and do not resist... the examination."
languages.original_text: "Вольный Торговец". {n}Хейнрикс обращается к вам сквозь стиснутые зубы.{/n} "Вы уничтожаете единственный шанс оказаться полезным для Инквизиции и меня лично. Не испытывайте судьбу и не сопротивляйтесь... следствию".

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Trader." {n}Heinrix addresses you through clenched teeth.{/n} "This so-called 'circus' is your only chance to make yourself useful to the Inquisition and me personally. Do not tempt fate and do not resist... the examination."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Trader." {n}Heinrix addresses you through clenched teeth.{/n} "This so-called 'circus' is your only chance to make yourself useful to the Inquisition and me personally. Do not tempt fate and do not resist... the examination."

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Trader." {n}Heinrix addresses you through clenched teeth.{/n} "This so-called 'buffoonery' is your only chance to make yourself useful to the Inquisition and me personally. Do not tempt fate and do not resist... the examination."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Trader." {n}Heinrix addresses you through clenched teeth.{/n} "This so-called 'buffoonery' is your only chance to make yourself useful to the Inquisition and me personally. Do not tempt fate and do not resist... the examination."

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Trader." {n}Heinrix addresses you through clenched teeth.{/n} "You are destroying your only chance to make yourself useful to the Inquisition and to me personally. Do not tempt fate and do not resist... the examination."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Trader." {n}Heinrix addresses you through clenched teeth.{/n} "You are destroying your only chance to make yourself useful to the Inquisition and to me personally. Do not tempt fate and do not resist... the examination."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}, {n}siffle Heinrix entre ses dents.{/n} Vous êtes en train de saboter votre seule chance de vous rendre utile auprès de l'Inquisition et de moi personnellement. Ne tentez pas le diable et ne résistez pas... à l'examen. »
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader." {n}Heinrix addresses you through clenched teeth.{/n} "You are destroying your only chance to make yourself useful to the Inquisition and to me personally. Do not tempt fate and do not resist... the examination."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}, {n}siffle Heinrix entre ses dents.{/n} Cette soi-disant "mascarade" est votre seule chance de vous rendre utile auprès de l'Inquisition et de moi personnellement. Ne tentez pas le diable et ne résistez pas... à l'examen. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “行商浪人。”{n}海因里希咬紧牙关，对你开了口。{/n}“这场所谓的‘闹剧’，是你唯一活命的机会。希望你能做个对审判庭有用的人，不要得寸进尺，不要反抗……这场审判。”
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader." {n}Heinrix addresses you through clenched teeth.{/n} "You are destroying your only chance to make yourself useful to the Inquisition and to me personally. Do not tempt fate and do not resist... the examination."

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人。”{n}海因里希咬紧牙关，对你开了口。{/n}“这场所谓的‘闹剧’，是你唯一活命的机会。希望你能做个对审判庭拥有的人，不要得寸进尺，不要反抗……这场审判。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「自由開拓者よ」{n}ハインリックスが歯を食いしばりながらあなたに話しかける。{/n}「異端審問庁や私個人にとって有益な存在になるための唯一のチャンスを台無しにしている。運命を試そうとせず、この尋問にも…逆らおうとはしないことだ」
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader." {n}Heinrix addresses you through clenched teeth.{/n} "You are destroying your only chance to make yourself useful to the Inquisition and to me personally. Do not tempt fate and do not resist... the examination."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者よ」{n}ハインリックスが歯を食いしばりながらあなたに話しかける。{/n}「異端審問庁や私個人にとって有益な存在になるための唯一のチャンスを台無しにしている。運命を試そうとせず、この尋問にも…逆らおうとはしないことだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}!" {n}Heinrix spricht dich durch zusammengebissene Zähne an.{/n} "Ihr zerstört Eure einzige Chance, Euch für die Inquisition und mich persönlich nützlich zu machen. Fordert nicht das Schicksal heraus, indem Ihr Euch ... der Untersuchung widersetzt."
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader." {n}Heinrix addresses you through clenched teeth.{/n} "You are destroying your only chance to make yourself useful to the Inquisition and to me personally. Do not tempt fate and do not resist... the examination."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}." {n}Heinrix spricht dich durch zusammengebissene Zähne an.{/n} "Diese sogenannte 'Posse' ist Eure einzige Chance, Euch für die Inquisition und mich persönlich nützlich zu machen. Fordert nicht das Schicksal heraus, indem Ihr Euch ... der Untersuchung widersetzt."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Comerciante Independiente». {n}Heinrix te habla con los dientes apretados.{/n} «Está echando por tierra su única oportunidad de demostrar que es útil para la Inquisición y para mí en particular. No tiente a la suerte y no se resista... a dar su declaración».
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader." {n}Heinrix addresses you through clenched teeth.{/n} "You are destroying your only chance to make yourself useful to the Inquisition and to me personally. Do not tempt fate and do not resist... the examination."

traits.locale_text: «Comerciante Independiente». {n}Heinrix te habla con los dientes apretados.{/n} «Lo que usted llama "teatrillo" es su única oportunidad de demostrar que es útil para la Inquisición y para mí en particular. No tiente a la suerte y no se resista... a dar su declaración».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Hür Tacir." {n}Heinrix, sıkılmış dişleri arasından sana hitap ediyor.{/n} "Kendini Engizisyon ve şahsım için işe yarar bir konumda tutma şansını yok ediyorsun. Kaderine karşı gelme, incelemeye direnme."
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader." {n}Heinrix addresses you through clenched teeth.{/n} "You are destroying your only chance to make yourself useful to the Inquisition and to me personally. Do not tempt fate and do not resist... the examination."

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir." {n}Heinrix sıkılmış dişleri arasından sana hitap ediyor.{/n} "Kendini Engizisyon ve şahsım için işe yarar bir konumda tutma şansını yok ediyorsun. Kaderine karşı gelme ve incelemeye direnme."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
